DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine antiviral effect follow three day dose BMS-824393 chronically genotype subtype 1a 1b Hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infect subject .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study In Treatment Naive Subjects Infected With Hepatitis C Virus
DOC.criteria: Treatment naive chronically infected subject Hepatitis C Virus genotype 1 HCV RNA viral load ≤10*5* IU/mL ( 100,000 IU/mL ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m² , inclusive Women pregnant breast feed Any significant acute chronic medical illness stable control medication consistent Hepatitis C infection Any medical , psychiatric and/or social reason , opinion Investigator , would make candidate inappropriate participation study
